import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const ContactMenuComponent = (props) => { const { name, registrationNumber, chat, events } = props return(
{name}
{registrationNumber}
) } export default ContactMenuComponent
